snippet: The Islamic State is releasing fewer propaganda items and has shifted its message away from that of a well-run caliphate....
lead_paragraph: The Islamic State is releasing fewer propaganda items and has shifted its message away from that of a well-run caliphate.

headline.main: ISIS Media Output Drops as Military Pressure Rises, Report Says
